Localization.Name: Sion Compensator3
Localization.Description:
Manufacturer: ArmaMod
Type: Ballistic Compensator
Attachment Point: Barrel
Size: 3

Aim Recoil: -30%
Visual Recoil: -20%
Audible Range: +20%

Maintain accuracy by countering muzzle rise with the Sion Compensator3. ArmaMod's expertly designed S3 barrel attachment efficiently expels gasses to keep every shot on target.
